titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to allow the identification of deceased individuals when necessary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit information furnished on an application for status adjustment to be used to identify a deceased individual if no other means of identification is available.
